member.name: T:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema
member.summary: Colors to use when writing to the console.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Debug
member.summary: The color to use for debug messages. Default is dark gray on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Info
member.summary: The color to use for informational messages. Default is gray on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Warn
member.summary: The color to use for warning messages. Default is dark red on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Error
member.summary: The color to use for error messages. Default is red on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Alert
member.summary: The color to use for alert messages. Default is dark yellow on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Critical
member.summary: The color to use for critical messages. Default is yellow on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Emergency
member.summary: The color to use for emergency messages. Default is white on red.

member.name: T:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme
member.summary: Color scheme for logging messages.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme.Foreground
member.summary: Foreground color.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme.Background
member.summary: Background color.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme.#ctor(System.ConsoleColor,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Instantiates a new color scheme.

member.name: T:SyslogLogging.FileLoggingMode
member.summary: Specify whether or not log messages should be appended to a file. Disabled: file logging will not be used. SingleLogFile: all messages will be appended to a single file. FileWithDate: all messages will be appended to a file, where the name of the file is the supplied filename followed by '.yyyyMMdd'.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.FileLoggingMode.Disabled
member.summary: File logging will not be used.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.FileLoggingMode.SingleLogFile
member.summary: All messages will be appended to a single file.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.FileLoggingMode.FileWithDate
member.summary: All messages will be appended to a file, where the name of the file is the supplied filename followed by '.yyyyMMdd'.

member.name: T:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule
member.summary: Syslog, console, and file logging module.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Settings
member.summary: Logging settings.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Servers
member.summary: List of syslog servers.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate the object using localhost syslog (UDP port 514).

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiate the object using the specified syslog server IP address and UDP port.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{SyslogLogging.SyslogServer},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiate the object using a series of servers.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.#ctor(System.String,SyslogLogging.FileLoggingMode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiate the object to enable either file logging or console logging.
member.param: File logging mode. If you specify 'FileWithDate', .yyyyMMdd will be appended to the specified filename.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Dispose
member.summary: Tear down the client and dispose of background workers.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Debug' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Info' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Warn' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Error' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Alert(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Alert' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Critical(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Critical' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Emergency(System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using 'Emergency' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Exception(System.Exception,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send log messages containing Exception details using 'Alert' severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Log(SyslogLogging.Severity,System.String)
member.summary: Send a log message using the specified severity.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingModule.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose of the resource.

member.name: T:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings
member.summary: Logging settings.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.HeaderFormat
member.summary: Header format. Provide a string that specifies how the preamble of each message should be structured. You can use variables including: {ts}: UTC timestamp {host}: Hostname {thread}: Thread ID {sev}: Severity Default: {ts} {host} {thread} {sev} A space will be inserted between the header and the message.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Timestamp format.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.EnableConsole
member.summary: Enable or disable console logging. Settings this to true will first validate if a console exists. If a console is not available, it will be set to false.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.MinimumSeverity
member.summary: Minimum severity required to send a message.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.EnableColors
member.summary: Enable or disable use of color for console messages.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.Colors
member.summary: Colors to use for console messages based on message severity.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.FileLogging
member.summary: Enable or disable logging to a file. Disabled: file logging will not be used. SingleLogFile: all messages will be appended to a single file. FileWithDate: all messages will be appended to a file, where the name of the file is the supplied filename followed by '.yyyyMMdd'.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.LogFilename
member.summary: The file to which log messages should be appended.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.ExceptionSeverity
member.summary: The severity level to use when logging exceptions through the .Exception() method.

member.name: P:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.MaxMessageLength
member.summary: Maximum message length. Must be greater than or equal to 32. Default is 1024.

member.name: M:SyslogLogging.LoggingSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.summary: Warning messages.

member.summary: Error messages.

member.summary: Alert messages.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.Severity.Critical
member.summary: Critical messages.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.Severity.Emergency
member.summary: Emergency messages.
